formulas.name: querySericeResourcesPerson
formulas.expression: "SELECT ServiceResource.name FROM AssignedResource WHERE ServiceResource.IsPerson__c = true AND ServiceAppointmentId = '"&{!myShiftTable.firstSelectedRow.Id}&"'"

formulas.name: queryServiceResourcesNoPerson
formulas.expression: "SELECT ServiceResource.name FROM AssignedResource WHERE ServiceResource.IsPerson__c = false AND ServiceAppointmentId = '"&{!myShiftTable.firstSelectedRow.Id}&"'"

formulas.name: soqlAppointments
formulas.expression: "select id, Worktype__c, Parent_Account_Name__c,Duration, SchedStartTime, SchedEndTime, Status,ParentRecordId,Spent_Credit__c from ServiceAppointment where id in(Select ServiceAppointmentId from AssignedResource where ServiceResourceId ='" + {!serviceResourceId} + "') AND Status in('Unpaid','Paid') and SchedStartTime >= " + {!formulaStart} + " AND SchedEndTime <= " + {!formulaEnd} + " Order By SchedStartTime ASC"
